about_the_game:
Welcome to the Apocalypse!

Do dinosaurs rule the earth? Not only them, but also zombies! Why? Because they can.

In this video game, you are one of those dinosaurs subjected to an experiment to regain your... human intelligence? Who cares.



Run, zombie dinosaur, run! (this sounds more ridiculous every time), flee far away with your new post-apocalyptic car escaping from the post-apocalyptic scientists who want to hunt you down.

Have you run out of gasoline? You're screw**... I mean, explore the world to find more gasoline, and run, and more gasoline, until EVERYTHING EXPLODES!

Didn't I tell you that you have to complete the whole game in 15 minutes, right? What a negligence on my part! MUAHAHA.

In this game, you will have to explore the world in search of gasoline for your car while fleeing from zombies and fire-breathing dinosaurs.


Join this adventure and you will be able to:

-During the day: Drive through the destroyed cities, trying to get as far as possible without being destroyed.
-At night: Explore the abandoned cities while facing waves of zombies and dinosaurs, trying to find gasoline and resources.
-Multiplayer mode for an even crazier experience with your partner.
-4 different endings depending on how far you manage to drive.
-Different and interchangeable weapons, choose the one you like the most!
-Are you dying of thirst? It's normal, you have to stay alive by finding water and food.
-Dodge enemies, run and destroy the environment at will :) but be careful, this will make you need to eat better like a good dinosaur.


As soon as you have some gasoline, flee and keep fleeing with your beloved car while bandits and thieves try to destroy you. Get as far as possible in 15 minutes before a nuclear bomb explodes.

Play MAD & MAX alone or with a partner while controlling both in the same car, you're going to kick the bucket.
